template.name: A_IdentifierSynonym_Object
template.title: Identifier or synonym --> Database object.
template.longDescription: Find an entry in the database using any identifier or synonym.
template.comment: This is the template that the quick search runs. If the name is changed it also has to be changed for the quick search configuration - Rachel.

template.name: A_Object_Identifiers
template.title: Database object --> Identifier, name, symbol, all synonyms.
template.longDescription: Show all names, symbols and identifiers (including synonyms) for a particular database entry.

constraint.description: Enter a name or identifier (eg a gene or protein name or identifier):

template.name: AllGene_Chromosome
template.title: All genes organism X --> All chromosomal locations.
template.longDescription: Show the chromosome location and sequence for all genes from a particular organism.

query.name: AllGene_Chromosome
query.view: Gene.chromosome.identifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.length Gene.organismDbId Gene.identifier Gene.symbol

constraint.description: Show the chromosome location and gene sequences for all genes from organism:

template.name: All_Genes_In_Organism_To_Publications
template.title: All Genes In Organism -> Publications
template.longDescription: Show the publications for each gene in an organism. Data currently avaiable for C.elegans, D.melanogaster, and S.cerevisiae.

query.name: All_Genes_In_Organism_To_Publications
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.symbol Gene.publications.pubMedId Gene.publications.firstAuthor Gene.publications.journal Gene.publications.year Gene.organism.name

template.name: AnatomyTerm_Region
template.title: Anatomy term [D. melanogaster] --> Regulatory regions.
template.longDescription: Show all the regulatory regions that have been associated with a specific anatomy ontology term, according to REDfly.

template.name: CDNAClone_To_Gene_Type_Converter
template.title: CDNAClone to gene type converter

template.name: CDNAClone_To_Protein_Type_Converter
template.title: CDNAClone to protein type converter

template.name: ChromLocation_AmplimerPrimer
template.title: Chromosomal location --> Tiling path amplimers + primers.
template.longDescription: Show microarray tiling path amplimers and the primers used to create them that are located between two points on a chromosome.

query.name: ChromLocation_AmplimerPrimer
query.view: PCRProduct.chromosome.identifier PCRProduct.identifier PCRProduct.length PCRProduct.primers.identifier PCRProduct.primers.sequence.residues PCRProduct.primers.chromosomeLocation.start PCRProduct.primers.chromosomeLocation.end PCRProduct.subjects.subject.identifier PCRProduct.subjects.subject.sequence.residues PCRProduct.subjects.subject.chromosomeLocation.start PCRProduct.subjects.subject.chromosomeLocation.end
query.constraintLogic: D and A and C and B and E

constraint.description: Show tiling path amplimers located on chromsome:
Show only 'promoter' amplimers (those located at the 5' end of annotated genes)?

template.name: ChromLocation_DrosDelDeletion
template.title: Chromosomal location [D. melanogaster] --> All DrosDel deletions.
template.longDescription: Show DrosDel deletions for a particular chromosomal location.

constraint.description: Show DrosDel deletions on chromosome:

template.name: ChromLocation_Gene
template.title: Chromosomal location --> All genes.
template.longDescription: Show the genes located between two points on a chromosome

query.name: ChromLocation_Gene
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

constraint.description: Show the genes located on chromosome:
from organism:

template.name: ChromLocation_GeneTranscriptExon
template.title: Chromosomal location --> All genes, transcripts, exons.
template.longDescription: Show the genes, transcripts and exons located between two points on a chromosome. Give the location of the exons.

query.name: ChromLocation_GeneTranscriptExon
query.view: Chromosome.identifier Chromosome.exons.gene.organismDbId Chromosome.exons.gene.symbol Chromosome.exons.gene.identifier Chromosome.exons.transcripts.identifier Chromosome.exons.identifier Chromosome.exons.objects.start Chromosome.exons.objects.end Chromosome.exons.objects.strand
query.constraintLogic: D and A and C and B

constraint.description: Show the genes, transcripts and exons located on chromosome:
between base:

template.name: ChromLocation_GeneTranscriptINDAC
template.title: Chromosomal location --> Genes, transcripts, INDAC long oligos.
template.longDescription: Show the genes, transcripts and INDAC oligos located in a particular chromosome location.

query.name: ChromLocation_GeneTranscriptINDAC
query.view: Gene.chromosome.identifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.organismDbId Gene.identifier Gene.symbol Gene.transcripts.identifier Gene.transcripts.microarrayOligos.identifier Gene.transcripts.microarrayOligos.sequence.residues

constraint.description: Show genes, transcripts and Indac oligos located on chromosome:

template.name: ChromLocation_Region
template.title: Chromosomal location [D. melanogaster] --> Regulatory regions + chromosomal locations and lengths of these regions.
template.longDescription: For a specific chromosomal location of D. melanogaster, show all regulatory regions with their length and chromosomal coordinates.

query.name: ChromLocation_Region
query.view: TFmodule.chromosome.identifier TFmodule.chromosomeLocation.start TFmodule.chromosomeLocation.end TFmodule.identifier TFmodule.length TFmodule.elementEvidence TFmodule.evidence.pubMedId

template.name: ChromLocation_RegionOverlappingTFBindingsite
template.title: Chromosomal location [D. melanogaster] --> Regulatory regions + TF binding sites overlapping these regions.
template.longDescription: For a specific chromosomal location of D. melanogaster, show all regulatory regions and the TF binding sites that overlap these region. Show the chromosomal positions, length and the genes associated with each region and binding site.

query.name: ChromLocation_RegionOverlappingTFBindingsite
query.view: TFmodule.chromosomeLocation.start TFmodule.chromosomeLocation.end TFmodule.length TFmodule.identifier TFmodule.gene.identifier TFmodule.gene.symbol TFmodule.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.start TFmodule.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.end TFmodule.overlappingFeatures.length TFmodule.overlappingFeatures.identifier TFmodule.overlappingFeatures.gene.symbol TFmodule.overlappingFeatures.gene.identifier

template.name: ChromLocation_TFBindingSiteLocationGeneFactor
template.title: Chromosomal location [D. melanogaster] --> TF binding sites + chromosomal locations, genes and transcription factors.
template.longDescription: For a particular D. melanogaster chromosomal location, show all FlyReg binding sites with their locations and associated genes and transcription factors.

query.name: ChromLocation_TFBindingSiteLocationGeneFactor
query.view: TFBindingSite.chromosome.identifier TFBindingSite.chromosomeLocation.start TFBindingSite.chromosomeLocation.end TFBindingSite TFBindingSite.factor TFBindingSite.gene

constraint.description: Show transcription factor binding sites, transcription factors and associated genes on D. melanogaster chromosome:

template.name: Chromosome_AmplimerLocation
template.title: Chromosome --> Tiling path amplimers + chromosomal locations of these amplimers.
template.longDescription: Show microarray tiling path amplicons and their location for a particular chromosome.

constraint.description: Show microarray tiling path amplicons located on chromosome:

template.name: Chromosome_Gene
template.title: Chromosome --> All genes.
template.longDescription: Show genes located on a particular chromosome.

query.name: Chromosome_Gene
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.organismDbId Gene.symbol Gene.chromosome.identifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand

constraint.description: Show genes located on chromosome

template.name: Chromosome_GeneInsertionLocation
template.title: Chromosome [D. melanogaster] --> All genes with P-element insertions + chromosomal location of genes and P-element insertions.
template.longDescription: For a particular chromosome, show genes that have an overlapping P-element insertion. Show the coordinates of the gene and the P-element insertion.

query.name: Chromosome_GeneInsertionLocation
query.view: Gene.chromosome.identifier Gene.identifier Gene.symbol Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.overlappingFeatures.identifier Gene.overlappingFeatures.symbol Gene.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.end

constraint.description: Search for genes on chromosome:

template.name: Chromosome_IntergenicSequence
template.title: Chromosome --> All intergenic regions + start, end and length of intergenic regions.
template.longDescription: For a particular chromosome show start, end and length of all intergenic regions.

constraint.description: Select an organism:
Show intergenic regions for chromosome:

template.name: Chromosome_RegionOverlappingInsertion
template.title: Chromosome [D. melanogaster] --> All regulatory regions + P-element insertion sites overlapping these regions.
template.longDescription: For a specific chromosome from D. melanogaster, show all regulatory regions and P-element insertion sites that overlap each other. Show chromosomal locaions for all regions and insertions sites.

query.name: Chromosome_RegionOverlappingInsertion
query.view: TFmodule.identifier TFmodule.chromosome.identifier TFmodule.chromosomeLocation.start TFmodule.chromosomeLocation.end TFmodule.overlappingFeatures.identifier TFmodule.overlappingFeatures.symbol TFmodule.overlappingFeatures.chromosome.identifier TFmodule.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.start TFmodule.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.end

template.name: DRSCScreen_ScreenHit
template.title: Published RNAi Screen [D. melanogaster] --> RNAi screen results.
template.longDescription: Show all results from a specific published DRSC screen.

query.name: DRSCScreen_ScreenHit
query.view: RNAiScreenHit.analysis.publication.pubMedId RNAiScreenHit.analysis.name RNAiScreenHit.gene.organismDbId RNAiScreenHit.amplicon.identifier RNAiScreenHit.result RNAiScreenHit.strength RNAiScreenHit.hasPredictedOffTargetEffect RNAiScreenHit.numOffTargets RNAiScreenHit.carRepeats

template.name: DRSCamplicon_ScreenHit
template.title: Amplicon [D. melanogaster] --> RNAi screen results.
template.longDescription: Find results from the Drosophila RNAi Screening Center for a particular amplicon. Both DRSC or HFA amplicon identifier can be used.

query.name: DRSCamplicon_ScreenHit
query.view: RNAiScreenHit.amplicon.identifier RNAiScreenHit.analysis.name RNAiScreenHit.analysis.cellLine RNAiScreenHit.analysis.analysisDescription RNAiScreenHit.analysis.publication.pubMedId RNAiScreenHit.result RNAiScreenHit.strength RNAiScreenHit.numOffTargets RNAiScreenHit.carRepeats

template.name: DatasetGiot_ProteinInteractions
template.title: Dataset [Giot et al] --> high confidence protein interactions (or filter on confidence value).
template.longDescription: Show the set of high-confidence interactions from the Giot et al dataset (or filter this dataset on confidence score).

constraint.description: Show protein interactions from the Giot et al dataset which have a confidence score: (default will give the high-confidence set defined by the authors of this study).

template.name: Dataset_proteinInteractions
template.title: Dataset --> All pairs of protein interactions.
template.longDescription: Show all protein interactions from a particular dataset.

constraint.description: Show all protein interactions from the dataset:

template.name: Disease_GeneOrthologue
template.title: Disease [Human] --> Genes + D. melanogaster homologues.
template.longDescription: For a given human disease, show all human genes that have been annotated with it, and the homologous genes in Drosophila, according to Homophila.

template.name: Disease_GeneOrthologueEValue
template.title: Disease [Human] --> Genes + D. melanogaster homologues (filter on blast E-Value).
template.longDescription: For a given human disease, show all human genes that have been annotated with it, and the homologous genes in Drosophila with a certain E-Value, according to Homophila. (The lower the E-Value, the better the match).

template.name: DrosDel_GeneLocation
template.title: DrosDel deletion [D. melanogaster] --> Genes + chromosomal location of DrosDel deletion and genes.
template.longDescription: For a specific DrosDel deletion, report chromosome, deletion identifier and coordinates together with identifiers and coordinates of overlapping genes.

query.name: DrosDel_GeneLocation
query.view: Deletion.chromosome.identifier Deletion.identifier Deletion.chromosomeLocation.start Deletion.chromosomeLocation.end Deletion.overlappingFeatures.organismDbId Deletion.overlappingFeatures.symbol Deletion.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.strand Deletion.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.start Deletion.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.end

template.name: DrosDel_LocationGeneTranscriptINDAC
template.title: DrosDel deletion [D. melanogaster] --> Chromosomal location + genes + transcripts + overlapping INDAC oligos.
template.longDescription: Show chromosomal location, overlapping genes, transcripts and INDAC oligos for a specific DrosDel deletion.

query.name: DrosDel_LocationGeneTranscriptINDAC
query.view: Deletion.identifier Deletion.chromosome.identifier Deletion.chromosomeLocation.start Deletion.chromosomeLocation.end Deletion.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.strand Deletion.overlappingFeatures.identifier Deletion.overlappingFeatures.symbol Deletion.overlappingFeatures.transcripts.identifier Deletion.overlappingFeatures.transcripts.microarrayOligos.identifier

constraint.description: Enter DrosDel deletion id:

template.title: Exon to gene type converter

template.title: GO term identifier --> Genes in one specific organism.

template.title: GO term name -> GO term identifier
template.longDescription: Find the GO identifier for a specific term.

template.name: Gene _adjacent genes
template.title: Gene --> adjacent genes (upstream and downstream)
template.longDescription: For a particular gene or set of genes, give the upstream and the downstream adjacent genes.

constraint.description: Gene identifier:

template.name: GeneOrganism_OrthologueOrganism
template.title: All genes organism1 --> Orthologues organism2.
template.longDescription: Show the predicted orthologues between two organisms.

query.name: GeneOrganism_OrthologueOrganism
query.view: Orthologue.object.identifier Orthologue.object.symbol Orthologue.object.organismDbId Orthologue.subject.identifier Orthologue.subject.symbol Orthologue.subject.organismDbId

constraint.description: Show the predicted orthologues between:

template.name: GeneOrganism_OrthologueRNAi
template.title: All genes organism X --> C. elegans orthologues + RNAi phenotypes of these orthologues.
template.longDescription: Show the C. elegans orthologue and RNAi phenotypes for all genes from a particular organism.

query.name: GeneOrganism_OrthologueRNAi
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.symbol Gene.orthologues.subject.identifier Gene.orthologues.subject.symbol Gene.orthologues.subject.annotations.code Gene.orthologues.subject.annotations.name

constraint.description: Show C. elegans orthologues and RNAi phenotypes for organism:

template.name: GeneSymbol_Identifier
template.title: Gene symbol --> Gene identifier.
template.longDescription: For the following gene symbol, show its gene identifier

template.name: GeneTissue_FlyAtlas
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] + Tissue [D. melanogaster] --> FlyAtlas data.
template.longDescription: For a given D. melanogaster gene, show expression data for a particular tissue from FlyAtlas.

query.name: GeneTissue_FlyAtlas
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.probeSets.identifier Gene.microArrayResults.assays.name Gene.microArrayResults.MRNASignal Gene.microArrayResults.MRNASignalSEM Gene.microArrayResults.presentCall Gene.microArrayResults.enrichment Gene.microArrayResults.affyCall

constraint.description: For the following gene:
Show FlyAtlas data in:

template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> RNAi screen results + C. elegans orthologues with RNAi results.
template.longDescription: Show papers decribing RNAi screens where the following D. melanogaster gene was involved. Show C. elegans orthologues for this gene and papers describing RNAi results for the orthologues.

query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.property.namespace Gene.goAnnotation.property.name Gene.goAnnotation.property.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.goEvidenceCodes.code Gene.goAnnotation.qualifier

template.name: Gene_Orthologue

template.longDescription: Show predicted orthologues for a particular gene.

query.name: Gene_Orthologue

template.name: Gene_OrthologueDisease
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> Human homologue + disease associated with this homologue.
template.longDescription: For a given Drosophila gene, show the homologous human gene (and the BlastMatch E-Value) and any associated disease, according to Homophila.

constraint.description: Seach for blast matches for gene:

template.name: Gene_OrthologueDiseaseEValue
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> Human homologue + disease associated with this homologue (filter on blast E-Value).
template.longDescription: For a given Drosophila gene, show the homologous human genes with a certain E-Value, and any associated disease, according to Homophila. (The lower the E-Value, the better the match).

template.name: Gene_OrthologueDiseaseRNAi
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> Human homologue with disease (filter on blast E-Value) + C. elegans orthologue with RNAi phenotype.
template.longDescription: For a given Drosophila gene, show disease-associated (via Homophila) human homologues as well as the RNAi phenotypes of C. elegans orthologues.

constraint.description: For the following Drosophila gene:
Find human orthologous from Homophila, with the following Blastmatch E-Value (the lower the E-Value, the better the match):

template.name: Gene_OrthologueGO
template.title: Gene --> Orthologues + GO terms of these orthologues.
template.longDescription: Show GO terms applied to orthologues of a specific gene.

constraint.description: Find orthologues with GO annotation for gene:

template.name: Gene_OrthologueOrganism
template.title: Gene --> Orthologues in one specific organism.
template.longDescription: For a particular gene, show predicted orthologues in one particular organism.

query.name: Gene_OrthologueOrganism
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.symbol Gene.organismDbId Gene.organism.name Gene.orthologues.subject.identifier Gene.orthologues.subject.symbol Gene.orthologues.subject.organismDbId Gene.orthologues.subject.organism.name

constraint.description: Show the predicted orthologues for gene;
From organism:
In organism:

template.name: Gene_OrthologueProteinInteraction
template.title: Gene --> Orthologues with protein-protein interactions + interacting proteins of the orthologues.

template.comment: Do not precompute - rns; 07.02.07: updated to run from gene identifier - Rachel.

query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.symbol Gene.organism.name Gene.orthologues.subject.identifier Gene.orthologues.subject.symbol Gene.orthologues.subject.organism.name Gene.orthologues.subject.proteins.primaryAccession Gene.orthologues.subject.proteins.interactingProteins.primaryAccession Gene.orthologues.subject.proteins.proteinInteractions.shortName

query.name: Gene_OrthologueRNAi

constraint.description: Search for any genes overlapping gene:

template.longDescription: For a particular gene, search for overlapping point mutations. Show the chromosome coordinates of any point mutations.

template.name: Gene_Protein
template.title: Gene --> Proteins.
template.longDescription: Show the proteins for a particular gene.

template.name: Gene_ProteinInteractingproteinConfidenceOtherDetails
template.title: Gene --> Protein + Interacting Proteins + confidence value for interaction + interaction detection method + publication
template.longDescription: For the protein product of a particular gene, show the proteins it has been shown to interact with, the confidence value assigned to this interaction, the interaction detection method and the publication for the experiment performed.
template.comment: 02.01.07: Changed so runs from Gene.identifier so appears on ODPs. Rachel.

template.name: Gene_ProteinInteractingproteinPfamdomainStructure
template.title: Gene --> Protein + Interacting Proteins + Pfam domain with predicted 3-D structure.

constraint.description: Show transcription factor binding sites for the gene:

template.name: Gene_TFBindingSiteRegionLocation
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> TF Binding sites and regulatory regions + chromosomal locations of these elements.
template.longDescription: For a particular D. melanogaster gene, show its transcription factor binding sites and regulatory regions with their locations.

template.name: Gene_TilingPathAmplimersLocation
template.title: Gene [Dm] --> Tiling path amplimers + chromosome location + primer sequences
template.longDescription: Show tiling path amplimers overlapping a particular gene. Give the chromsome coordinates, lenght of amplimer, Promotor (true/false) and the sequence of the primers. For a particular Drosophila gene, search for overlapping tiling path amplimers. Show chromosome coordinates of the amplimers, the amplimer length, whether it falls within a promotor and give the sequences of the primers.

constraint.description: Search for tiling path amplimers overlapping gene:

template.name: Gene_TilingPathSpanAmplimerLocation
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> Tiling path spans + amplimers + chromosome location.
template.longDescription: For a particular Drosophila gene, search for overlapping tiling path spans and associated amplimers. Show chromosome coordinates of the tiling path span and the amplimers.

constraint.description: Search for tiling path spans overlapping gene:

template.name: Gene_TilingPathSpanLocation
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> Tiling path spans + chromosomal locations.
template.longDescription: For a particular Drosophila gene, search for overlapping tiling path spans. Show the chromosomal coordinates of the tiling path spans.

constraint.description: Search for tiling path spans overlapping gene:

template.name: Gene_TimeCourseResult
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> Microarray Time Course data from Arbeitman et al.
template.longDescription: For a particular Drosophila gene show results from Arbeitman et al (2002) microarray time course experiment.

query.name: Gene_TimeCourseResult
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.microArrayResults.type Gene.microArrayResults.value Gene.microArrayResults.isControl Gene.microArrayResults.assays.sample2 Gene.microArrayResults.assays.sample1 Gene.microArrayResults.assays.name Gene.microArrayResults.assays.experiment.name Gene.microArrayResults.assays.experiment.publication.pubMedId

constraint.value: Arbeitman M: Gene Expression During the Life Cycle of Drosophila melanogaster

constraint.description: Show microarray time course results for gene (CGxxx identifier):

template.name: Gene_TimeCourseResultGeneralStage
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> Microarray Time course data from Arbeitman et al. (filter on general stage)
template.longDescription: For a particular Drosophila gene show results from Arbeitman et al (2002) microarray time course experiment at a particular stage. This template allows you to query on the general stage: use LIKE *Embryo*; *Larvae*; *Metamorphosis*; *Adult female* or *Adult male*. The templates Gene [D. melanogaster] --> Microarray Time course data from Arbeitman et al. (filter on specific stage (and ratio)) allow you to filter on more specific stages.

query.name: Gene_TimeCourseResultGeneralStage
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.microArrayResults.type Gene.microArrayResults.value Gene.microArrayResults.isControl Gene.microArrayResults.assays.sample2 Gene.microArrayResults.assays.sample1 Gene.microArrayResults.assays.experiment.name Gene.microArrayResults.assays.experiment.publication.pubMedId

constraint.description: Show microarray time course results for gene (CGxxx identifier):

constraint.value: Arbeitman M: Gene Expression During the Life Cycle of Drosophila melanogaster

constraint.description: at stage:

template.name: Gene_TimeCourseResultGeneralStageRatio
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> Microarray Time course data from Arbeitman et al. (filter on general stage and ratio)
template.longDescription: For a particular Drosophila gene show results from Arbeitman et al (2002) microarray time course experiment at a particular stage and filter on the median signal ratio. This template allows you to query on the general stage: use LIKE *Embryo*; *Larvae*; *Metamorphosis*; *Adult female* or *Adult male*. The templates Gene [D. melanogaster] --> Microarray Time course data from Arbeitman et al. (filter on specific stage (and ratio)) allow you to filter on more specific stages.

query.name: Gene_TimeCourseResultGeneralStageRatio
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.microArrayResults.type Gene.microArrayResults.value Gene.microArrayResults.isControl Gene.microArrayResults.assays.sample2 Gene.microArrayResults.assays.sample1 Gene.microArrayResults.assays.experiment.name Gene.microArrayResults.assays.experiment.publication.pubMedId
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

constraint.description: Show microarray time course results for gene (CGxxx identifier):

constraint.value: Arbeitman M: Gene Expression During the Life Cycle of Drosophila melanogaster

constraint.description: at stage:

template.title: Microarray Time course data from Arbeitman et al. (filter on general stage and ratio) --> Genes [D. melanogaster]
template.longDescription: Show gene expression data for a particular developmental stage according to the Arbeitman et al data set and filter this data on the median signal ratio. This template allows you to query on the general stage: use LIKE *Embryo*; *Larvae*; *Metamorphosis*; *Adult female* or *Adult male*. The templates Microarray Time course data from Arbeitman et al (filter on specific stage (and ratio)) --> Genes [D. melanogaster], allow you to filter on more specific stages.

query.name: TimeCourseDataGeneralStageRatio_genes
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.microArrayResults.type Gene.microArrayResults.value Gene.microArrayResults.isControl Gene.microArrayResults.assays.sample2 Gene.microArrayResults.assays.sample1 Gene.microArrayResults.assays.experiment.name Gene.microArrayResults.assays.experiment.publication.pubMedId

constraint.value: Arbeitman M: Gene Expression During the Life Cycle of Drosophila melanogaster

constraint.description: show data for developmental stage:
Only show results which have a median signal ratio of:

template.name: Tissue_Flyatlas
template.title: Tissue [D. melanogaster] --> FlyAtlas data.
template.longDescription: Show gene expression in the following tissue from D. melanogaster, according to FlyAtlas.

query.name: Tissue_Flyatlas
query.view: FlyAtlasResult.assays.name FlyAtlasResult.MRNASignal FlyAtlasResult.MRNASignalSEM FlyAtlasResult.presentCall FlyAtlasResult.enrichment FlyAtlasResult.affyCall FlyAtlasResult.genes.identifier FlyAtlasResult.genes.symbol FlyAtlasResult.genes.probeSets.identifier
query.constraintLogic: A and C and B and D and E

constraint.description: Show genes expressed in the following tissue:
that were detectably expressed in the following number of arrays (out of 4):
with the following enrichment
and the following mRNA signal.
with Affy call:

query.name: TranscriptionFactor_Genes
query.view: Gene.regulatoryRegions.factor.identifier Gene.regulatoryRegions.factor.symbol Gene.identifier Gene.symbol Gene.chromosome.identifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand

template.name: flyreg_info
template.title: FlyReg binding sites -> gene + transcription factor + chromosomal location + sequence + pubmedID
template.longDescription: For a particular (or all) flyreg transcription factor binding sites, give the gene, factor, chromosome location, sequence and pubmed id. (Leaving as default will return information for all flyreg binding sites).

query.name: flyreg_info
query.view: TFBindingSite.identifier TFBindingSite.length TFBindingSite.gene.identifier TFBindingSite.factor.identifier TFBindingSite.chromosome.identifier TFBindingSite.chromosomeLocation.start TFBindingSite.chromosomeLocation.end TFBindingSite.sequence.residues TFBindingSite.evidence.pubMedId

constraint.description: Flyreg binding site identifier:

template.name: gene_adjacentgenes_allflyatlas
template.title: Gene --> adjacent genes + all FlyAtlas data
template.longDescription: For a particular gene or set of genes give the upstream and downstream adjacent genes and show the FlyAtlas data for these genes.

constraint.description: Gene identifier:

template.name: gene_downstreamAdjacentgene_FlyAtlas
template.title: Gene --> downstream adjacent gene --> FlyAtlas data
template.longDescription: For a particular gene or set of genes, give the downstream adjacent gene and any FlyAtlas data that have certain constraints.

query.name: gene_downstreamAdjacentgene_FlyAtlas
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

constraint.description: Gene identifier:
mRNA signal
affy call:

template.name: pathway_genes

template.longDescription: For a particular KEGG pathway, list all the genes [from Drosophila melanogaster) that are involved.

constraint.description: Pathway name:
